#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll unsigned long long
#define PII pair<ll, ll>
#define f first
#define s second
#define F(i,a,b) for(ll i = (ll)(a); i <= (ll)(b); i++)
#define RF(i,a,b) for(ll i = (ll)(a); i >= (ll)(b); i--)

ll arr[21], n, tmp, t, ans;
int main() 
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	arr[0]=1;
	F(i,1,20)
		arr[i]=arr[i-1]*i;	
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {	
	    ans=0;
	    cin>>n;
	    F(i,2,n)
	    {
	    	tmp=arr[n]/arr[i];
	    	if(i%2)
	    		ans-=tmp;
	    	else
	    		ans+=tmp;
	    }
	    cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
    return 0;
}
